CAREER_AFTER_12TH.text: After 12th, complete {llb_type} LLB ({duration} years). Then appear for {exam} in {state}. Minimum age: {min_age} years.

EXAM_REQUIRED.text: In {state}, clear the {exam} after LLB. Stages: Prelims → Mains → Interview.

ROLE_EXPLANATION.text: A Judge listens to both sides, examines evidence, and delivers a fair and impartial decision.

AGE_RESPONSE.text: Minimum age for {exam} in {state} is {min_age} years. Upper limit usually 35-40 years.

LLB_GUIDANCE.text: {state} allows {llb_type} LLB for judiciary. {duration} year course from BCI approved college.

EXAM_PATTERN.text: {exam} has 3 stages: 1) Prelims (objective), 2) Mains (descriptive), 3) Interview/Viva Voce.

PREP_TIPS.text: Focus on Constitution, IPC, CrPC, Evidence Act, CPC. Practice answer writing and previous papers.

GENERAL_PATH.text: 1. Complete LLB (3/5 years) → 2. Enroll with State Bar Council → 3. Clear {exam} → 4. Become Civil Judge.
